original_text: To meet this expectation and demonstrate traction, we propose a key performance indicator: 90% of parents actively view their teen’s spending insights at least once per month.
units: To meet this expectation and demonstrate traction , we propose a key performance indicator : 90 % of parents actively view their teen ’s spending insights at least once per month .
90 % of parents actively view their teen ’s spending insights at least once per month .
